Collect using the DBI package

Source: R/dbi_collect.R
dbi_collect.Rd

Collect using the DBI package

Usage

dbi_collect(query, connection = getOption("con.default.value"))

Arguments

query

the sql query built from dbplyr

connection

connection to the db. can leave blank if set using options

Value

collected dataframe
